name: Reaper (itch) (Greatheart Games)
description:
You are the Grim Reaper from the future. You travelled back in time to stop a crime lord of the 80's, to save the future. But he is expecting you and has set up his defences deep in his base. It is your job to go deeper and deeper into the base, kill the crime lord and everyone associated with him. 

Controls

As the Grim Reaper you have skills to help you achive your goal. Your skills are:

  • Swinging your scythe for close attacks. (Left mouse button)
  • Throwing your scythe for long ranged attack, but beware you cannot attack normally while throwing you scythe. (Right mouse button)
  • Teleporting into enemies, making them explode, though this ability has a cooldown marked by particles around you. (e)
  • Mind controlling enemies and making them explode as you leave them, though this cooldown is marked by an orb around your head. (f)

The boss is a bit finicky, and takes some time to master.
